definitions.definition: a particular time, especially when something happens or has happened:
examples: We met on several occasions to discuss the issue.
Sara's party was quite an occasion - there were over a hundred people there.

definitions.definition: an opportunity or reason for doing something or for something to happen:
examples: The 200th anniversary of Mozart's death was the occasion for hundreds of special films, books and concerts.
He has, on occasion, made a small mistake.
Her refusal occasioned a lot of trouble.
